revised_title: Unwinding Thread Tension and Motion: A Study on Steady Unwinding
tldr: The authors investigate the fluctuating tensions in a perfectly flexible string unwinding from a stationary package and examine the dependence of unwinding tensions on air resistance, unwinding speed, angle of winding, number of "balloons," angle of conical packages, and more. Predicted and experimental values of the tensions are compared, and the stability of different modes of unwinding will be investigated in part II.
